word_mean: 分泌，分泌作用：由于腺体作用合成特殊产物的过程
腺体作用范围较广，从自血液中分离出某种物质，到合成新的化学物质
任何分泌物：由分泌产生的物质

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French sécrétion or Latin secretio(n-) 'separation', from secret- 'moved apart', from the verb secernere

entry.def: Secretion is the process by which certain liquid substances are produced by parts of plants or from the bodies of people or animals.
Secretions are liquid substances produced by parts of plants or bodies.

means.word_mean: 1. the organic process of synthesizing and releasing some substance
2. a functionally specialized substance (especially one that is not a waste) released from a gland or cell
